NTA I dont understand why the dr pulled you aside to tell you when they should have told her instead. If she is in therapy why isn't the therapist teaching her better ways of coping? 

Your gf needs to understand her disease and learn how to control it. It's hard, but def not something they are going to be able to do in an emergency room. Try looking up different excercises and methods to control anxiety attacks and instead of taking her to the hospital sit with here and try them out. 

The worse thing you can do is single her out and make her feel alone. It takes time but she will figure it out and learn her disease, but you both are young so give it time. Good luck.

Idk if that's the case with you, but it is with us.

Torrid use to be great quality, but lately it's gone to shit. Leggings dont last more than a month. I feel like I'm always sewing a hole in their shirts and pants...holes are always at the seams so I know it's a quality concern. I always wash with cold water and air dry most things and still just seems to fall apart. 

I have talked to the stores about it, even sent messages, posted on the torrid Facebook/insta/Twitter, but no one seems to care. Totally sucks because torrid has been my lifeline since high school üò≠.
